publications.title: Preventing Static Element Double Counting in Urban Video Segmentation for Autonomous Driving
publications.summary: Revisitation-aware framework that prevents static surfaces from being counted multiple times when routes loop or cars revisit views. Uses temporally smoothed per-pixel labels, pixel-level instance tracking, and a semantics-driven revisitation detector to improve route-level composition accuracy.

Improved analytics efficiency and response times with caching and query optimization.
